channel.title: What's up, It's been a while
channel.description:
It's been a while sense I worked on my mod. I couldn't get it completed. So I guess it just sat for a long time. I guess that's why I never released it.
I wanted to add some kind of Minecarts to the game. That anyone could unlock in Tier 3. It's just too complex for me to do. So I guess I'll have to come up with a new mod name. Anyway I'm still have issues with Materials and Textures. I have all ways had a hard time getting my machines to look some thing like a machine.
I wanted to know if any part of the modding has been updated. Is there a new starter project. I don't even know what version of that I even have.
Thanks to everyone that has helped me in the past.

item.title: What's up, It's been a while
item.dc:creator: @iceman11a Iceman11a *
item.description:
@iceman11a wrote:

It’s been a while sense I worked on my mod. I couldn’t get it completed. So I guess it just sat for a long time. I guess that’s why I never released it.

I wanted to add some kind of Minecarts to the game. That anyone could unlock in Tier 3. It’s just too complex for me to do. So I guess I’ll have to come up with a new mod name. Anyway I’m still have issues with Materials and Textures. I have all ways had a hard time getting my machines to look some thing like a machine.

I wanted to know if any part of the modding has been updated. Is there a new starter project. I don’t even know what version of that I even have.

Thanks to everyone that has helped me in the past.
